div.head: Stamped medals from wax
div.ab: You can mold in wax, mixed with a bit of rosin so it will be harder & firmer, the relief of whatever you please, either an animal or a medal, & then, from it, make a hollow form of latten or copper. Or, hammer it mold it in relief and hammer it in a sheet of tin, And pu and then fill with lead & heat it. Try sheets of gemstone foils molded in a hollow form for lizards, &c.
